venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Thanks to all who responded with their preferences for this meetup. Let me start by apologizing for not being able to accommodate everyone's needs. There was quite a mix of feedback, from people who preferred to have meetups late in the day to those that were coming out of town and suggested moving to a location outside of Boston. I'm certainly open to mixing things up to involve different people/dogs, so if this next meetup doesn't work for you, stay tuned! I just wanted to get something organized to bring this meetup back to life sooner rather than later, but will continue to explore options for times/locations.

Last year we had a couple of meetups at Peter's Park, so let's try that again. Rob of Doggie Day has generously offered to continue to host this meetup, so I anticipate going back to Doggie Day on future occasions assuming scheduling works out.

So please let me know if you'll be able to attend and please do continue to provide your feedback on a regular basis. Looking forward to seeing you on May 31st!

Marjie and Pumpkin
item.name: Downtown Boston Maltese May Meetup - Let's Turn This Puppy Around!
